input_text:
Job Title: Electronics Design Engineer (Hybrid Power)

Location: Rochester, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job Description

Electronics Design Engineer (Hybrid Power)

/strong>45,000 - £50,000 NEG 25 Days Holiday Healthcare Benefits Training Progression Rapidly Growing Start Up

Rochester

Are you an Electronics Engineer, with experience in Analogue and Digital circuit design, seeking a senior role, for a hyper-growth SME which has doubled in size in the last 18 months, where you will play a crucial role in their ongoing success, working on a range of highly technical, cutting edge projects for the design and manufacture of specialist power and monitoring systems with sophisticated controls?

Do you have experience in PCB design, looking to work on landmark projects for highly reputable clients, within a specialist, forward thinking organisation, which provides innovative and sustainable solutions across marine and off grid markets, where you will add direct value, as you look to develop new and existing products and components?

The company provide hybrid power and monitoring systems with sophisticated control, which combine renewable energy sources with traditional power sources, enabling reduced emissions and improved energy efficiency. They develop cutting-edge technologies to provide the latest solutions for applications in marine, off grid and specialist vehicles, supplying to a diverse range of reputable clients.

You will be responsible for working across numerous product ranges, designing new and existing products and solutions, as well as testing and fault finding, and embedded programming.

The Role

Design and development of new and existing productsElectronic design of modules for the multiplex bus systemElectronic support for the off-grid product rangeDevelopment of low-level firmwareSchematic capture and PCB layout

The Person

Electronics Design EngineerAnalogue and Digital design experiencePCB Design experience

Keywords: Electronics Engineer, PCB, Analogue, Digital, Embedded programming, Electronic circuits, Rochester, Kent, Aylesbury, Hybrid Power, Power Systems, Control Panels

Reference Number: BBBH12821

We are an equal opportunities employer and welcome applications from all suitable candidates. The salary advertised is a guideline for this position. The offered renumeration will be dependent on the extent of your experience, qualifications, and skill set.

Ernest Gordon Recruitment Limited acts as an employment agency for permanent recruitment and employment business for the supply of temporary workers. By applying for this job, you accept the T&C's, Privacy Policy and Disclaimers which can be found at our website.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
